department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
description: W6898-250705. Provide grass cutting services to Department of National Defence – Real Property Operations Unit – Gagetown. Work includes all labour, material, tools, supervision, and equipment required to complete the grass mowing and groundskeeping maintenance services at various sites of 5 CDSB Gagetown.
duration_in_months: On or before May 21, 2024, at 2:00 PM
full_summary:
Government of Canada
Invitation to Tender: Grass Cutting Services
### Type of Invitation to Tender
This is a Request for Proposal (RFP) – Competitive, Open Bidding

### Contract Overview
The Government of Canada invites experienced contractors to submit a bid for the provision of grass cutting and groundskeeping maintenance services at various sites of the Department of National Defence – Real Property Operations Unit, 5 Canadian Division Support Base Gagetown, New Brunswick.

#### Project Details
- **Location**: Gagetown, New Brunswick, Canada
- **Services Requires**: Grass cutting and groundskeeping maintenance services at various sites, including Base – B, C, D Zones, partial M Zone, Camp Argonaut, WWTP, LV-9, Goan's Orchard, and Swift Water Site
- **Expected Term**: The services are expected to begin on May 30, 2024, and may be subject to renewal depending on performance and upon completion of an evaluation period

### Important Tender Information
- **Publication Date**: April 25, 2024
- **Tender Closing Date**: May 21, 2024, 2:00 PM EST
- **Trade Agreements**: This contract will be awarded in compliance with the Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA) and other applicable trade agreements.

### Technical Evaluation
- **Evaluation Criteria**: The successful contractor will be selected based on the proposal that represents the best overall value to the government, taking into account the Lowest Price criterion.

### Contact Information
For more information regarding this tender opportunity, please visit the Ariba Discovery website at: [https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19518232?extsite=MTk1MTgyMzJfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19518232?extsite=MTk1MTgyMzJfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)
Please direct all questions and inquiries to Nicole Fesseha at: nicole.fesseha@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca.

### Attachments
No attachments are available for this tender opportunity.

We look forward to receiving your proposals. Thank you for your interest.  #govementtenders #tenderannouncement #govcan # lawofprocurement\ # TheDeptof Public Works and Gov Serv is the contracting authority for this invitation to tender. They are located at 11 Laur
